title: Digital Clock AW-7
summary: Origianl digital watch face for android wear
description: Round and square digital watch faces for Android Wear device. The application supports 12/24 time format and all languages to show the current date.To control watch face appearence just touch on it: * Left top corner: set simple or full mode. * Right top corner: show date on/off. * Left bottom color: to change primary color (there are 2 colors). * Right bottom color: to change round or square shape (only for square device).
descriptionHTML:
Round and square digital watch faces for Android Wear device. The application supports 12/24 time format and all languages to show the current date.
To control watch face appearence just touch on it:
* Left top corner: set simple or full mode.
* Right top corner: show date on/off.
* Left bottom color: to change primary color (there are 2 colors).
* Right bottom color: to change round or square shape (only for square device).
